title: 3dKruskalWallis
description: This program performs nonparametric Kruskal-Wallis test for comparison of multiple treatments.

datasets.title: Data sets for treatments
datasets.description: Data set for treatment #1 through to treatment #s. Specify sub-brick if more than one present.

workmem.title: Workspace memory
workmem.description: Number of megabytes of RAM to use for statistical workspace

output.title: Output prefix
output.description: Kruskal-Wallis statistics are written to file prefixname
